pageContext.claim: “ICE officers in this region of our country arrested nearly 7,000 illegal aliens with criminal records. So you have 7,000 illegal aliens having criminal records, including those charged or convicted of murder, burglary, robbery, drug crimes, killings in the most violent way.”
pageContext.analysis: This is Trump's typical anti-immigrant spin. He is lumping in the small minority of ICE detainees who have committed serious crimes with the vast majority, who are criminals only in the sense that they broke immigration or traffic laws.
